event when the user navigates to a checkout screen.

package at the top of the file.
The event is automatically associated with the current user (identified or anonymous).
function can also keep track of properties associated to the event. Properties are a dictionary of string to any value that is directly encodable to json.
Properties also support nested arrays and dictionaries.
Log purchases on the Braze platform.

is called when the user makes a purchase.

The event is automatically associated with the current user (identified or anonymous).
can keep track of a dictionary of properties associated with the purchase.
